attributes.action: take note of the petitions posted here and to stop disregarding them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the inception of the E-Petition availability, it appears that petitions with few signatures are ignored and those with very many signatures result in a reply which consists of an explanation as to why the government is going to disregard the petition and carry on regardless. If e-petitons are to have credibility, they should not be used simply as a mailing list of people to whom the government issues its PR missives. This petition calls for replies to detail how and by which minister the petition has been reviewed and what changes have been made as a result.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
